author: iarspider
body:
#### PR description:

Companion PR for https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8484 - adopt to XRootD API changes

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34991 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35455
title: [10_6_X] Fixes for XRootD 5.x
